warranty.label: Warranty
warranty.wrntyfeatures: 3-year (3-3-3) limited warranty and service offering includes 3 years of parts, labor and on-site repair. Terms and conditions vary by country. Certain restrictions and exclusions apply.

weights.label: Weights
weights.weightmetnote: Starting weight without stand. Exact weight depends on configuration.

drives.label: Drives
drives.drivebaysext: One slim ODD; One SD 3 card reader (optional)

services.label: Services
services.saservices: Receive 3 years of next business day onsite repair from an HP-qualified technician for your computing device, if the issue cannot be solved remotely. For more information on Care Pack services, please visit www.hp.com/go/cpc.

security_management.label: Security Management
security_management.securitymgmt: Trusted Platform Module SLB9670TT1.2FW4.40 (TPM) 1.2 Common Criteria EAL4+ certified, field upgradeable to 2.0; SATA port disablement (via BIOS); Serial, parallel, USB enable/disable (via BIOS); Optional USB port disable at factory (user configurable via BIOS); Removable media write/boot control; Power-on password (via BIOS); Setup password (via BIOS); Support for chassis padlocks and cable lock devices; Support for port cable cover

processor.label: Processor
processor.processorname: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 with Intel HD Graphics 530 (3.7 GHz, 3 MB cache, 2 cores)

display_specifications.label: Display Specifications
display_specifications.display: 20" diagonal TN widescreen WLED backlit anti-glare non-touch LCD (1600 x 900)

compatibility.label: Compatibility
compatibility.accessories: HP 400 G2 AiO Recline Stand: T0A01AA; HP 400 G2 AiO Height Adjustable Stand: T0E53AA

battery_and_power.label: Battery and Power
battery_and_power.powersupply: 120 W, up to 88% efficient, active PFC (external)

software_and_applications.label: Software and Applications
software_and_applications.managefeatures: Update BIOS via Cloud or Network (BIOS feature); HP TouchPoint Manager

connectivity_and_communications.label: Connectivity and Communications
connectivity_and_communications.ioports_02: 2 USB 3.0; 2 USB 2.0; 1 DisplayPort 1.2; 1 audio line out; 1 RJ-45

dimenmet.label: Minimum dimensions (W x D x H)

product_names.label: Product Names
product_names.prodlongnamespecs: HP ProOne 400 G2 20-inch Non-Touch All-in-One PC with FreeDOS 2.0; Intel® Core™ i3-6100 with Intel HD Graphics 530 (3.7 GHz, 3 MB cache, 2 cores); 4 GB DDR4-2133 SDRAM (1 x 4 GB); 500 GB 7200 rpm SATA

multimedia_and_input_devices.label: Multimedia and Input Devices
multimedia_and_input_devices.audio: DTS Studio Sound™ audio management technology, HD audio with Realtek ALC3228 codec (all ports are stereo), microphone and headphone side ports (3.5 mm), audio line-out rear port (3.5 mm), multi-streaming capable, internal speaker.

legal_information.label: Legal Information

footnotes.label: Footnotes
footnotes.tsfootnote_04: [4] For storage drives, GB = 1 billion bytes. TB = 1 trillion bytes. Actual formatted capacity is less. Up to 16 GB (for Windows 7) and up to 36 GB (for Windows 8.1 and 10) of system disk is reserved for system recovery software.
footnotes.tsfootnote_10: [10] Microsoft Security Essentials requires Windows 7 and internet access.
footnotes.tsfootnote_03: [3] Multi-Core is designed to improve performance of certain software products. Not all customers or software applications will necessarily benefit from use of this technology. 64-bit computing system required. Performance will vary depending on your hardware and software configurations. Intel’s numbering is not a measurement of higher performance.
footnotes.tsfootnote_05: [5] Duplication of copyrighted material is strictly prohibited. Actual speeds may vary. Double Layer media compatibility will widely vary with some home DVD players and DVD-ROM drives. Note that DVD-RAM cannot read or write to 2.6GB Single Sided/5.2 Double Sided-Version 1.0 Media.
footnotes.tsfootnote_14: [14] External power supplies, power cords, cables and peripherals are not low halogen. Service parts obtained after purchase may not be low halogen.
footnotes.tsfootnote_12: [12] This product ships with TPM 1.2 with option to upgrade to TPM 2.0. Upgrade utility is expected to be available by the end of 2015 via HP Customer Support.
footnotes.tsfootnote_01: [1] Not all features are available in all editions or versions of Windows. Systems may require upgraded and/or separately purchased hardware, drivers, software or BIOS update to take full advantage of Windows functionality. Windows 10 is automatically updated, which is always enabled. ISP fees may apply and additional requirements may apply over time for updates. See http://www.microsoft.com
footnotes.tsfootnote_02: [2] This system is preinstalled with Windows 7 Professional software and also comes with a license and media for Windows 10 Pro software. You may only use one version of the Windows software at a time. Switching between versions will require you to uninstall one version and install the other version. You must back up all data (files, photos, etc.) before uninstalling and installing operating systems to avoid loss of your data.
footnotes.tsfootnote_11: [11] HP Drive Encryption requires Windows. Data is protected prior to Drive Encryption login. Turning the PC off or into hibernate logs out of Drive Encryption and prevents data access.
footnotes.tsfootnote_13: [13] EPEAT® registered where applicable. EPEAT registration varies by country. See www.epeat.net for registration status by country.
footnotes.tsfootnote_06: [6] Wireless cards are optional or add-on features and requires separately purchased wireless access point and internet service. Availability of public wireless access points limited. The specifications for the 802.11ac WLAN are draft specifications and are not final. If the final specifications differ from the draft specifications, it may affect the ability of this desktop PC to communicate with other 802.11ac WLAN devices.
footnotes.tsfootnote_09: [9] HP ePrint requires an Internet connection to HP web-enabled printer and HP ePrint account registration (for a list of eligible printers, supported documents and image types and other HP ePrint details, see www.hp.com/go/businessmpobileprinting). HP PageLift requires Windows 7 or higher.
footnotes.tsfootnote_07: [7] HD content required to view HD images.

family_positioning.label: Family Positioning
family_positioning.family_positioning_overview_medium: Keep growing your business, not your expenses. The HP ProDesk 400 G1 Series offers expandable desktop PC options that meet your everyday needs with enough room to grow. Watch your business flourish while minimizing the total cost of ownership.

limited_messaging_scenarios.label: Limited Messaging Scenarios
limited_messaging_scenarios.ltdproddes_medium: Proven performance and reliability to deliver maximum investment protection.
limited_messaging_scenarios.ltdproddes_long: Offering the perfect combination of performance, reliability and investment protection to any IT environment. For businesses that require superior stability and manageability with low lifecycle costs, or desktops with proven technology, superior price/performance and a wide choice of features, or even entry-level PCs that balance price and essential computing capabilities – the HP Desktop family holds the solution.

key_selling_points.label: Key Selling Points
key_selling_points.ksp_02_suppt_01_long: New 6th Generation Intel® Core™ 65W processors[2] bring high end processing power to the AiO that evokes tower-like performance.
key_selling_points.ksp_03_suppt_01_short: Collaboration tools on the HP ProOne 400 provide business users a clear audio and visual experience.
key_selling_points.ksp_04_suppt_01_short: Security tools to safeguard and manage business data and devices.
key_selling_points.ksp_01_suppt_01_long: Stylish design featuring extensive cable management and clean lines makes this AiO suitable for a front desk or an open office with a 20” diagonal IPS display[3] for space-constrained work environments.
key_selling_points.ksp_03_suppt_01_long: Interact naturally with your PC using Cortana[4] on Windows 10.[1] Enjoy impressive collaboration tools like optional Skype for Business,[3] HP Noise Reduction Software, and a 1 MP HD webcam.
key_selling_points.ksp_02_suppt_01_short: Get tower-like performance in an AiO powered by new 6th Generation Intel® Core™, Pentium™ and Celeron™ processors.[2]
key_selling_points.ksp_01_suppt_01_short: Achieve business productivity with an all-in-one PC design that fits almost any workplace.
key_selling_points.ksp_04_suppt_01_long: Stay up and running with business-class security solutions, including TPM, HP BIOSphere[5] and HP Client Security.[6] Optional security locks, privacy screens, and encrypted drives[3] also help keep data and your investment safe.

ecoquicklinksbullet_02_url_statement.label: ECO quick links bullet 02 URL statement

footnotes.label: Footnotes
footnotes.msgfootnote_05: [5] HP BIOSphere features may vary depending on the PC platform & configuration.
footnotes.msgfootnote_01: [1] Not all features are available in all editions or versions of Windows. Systems may require upgraded and/or separately purchased hardware, drivers and/or software to take full advantage of Windows functionality. Windows 10 is automatically updated, which is always enabled. ISP fees may apply and additional requirements may apply over time for updates. See http://www.microsoft.com.
footnotes.msgfootnote_04: [4] Cortana experience may vary by device, region. Some features including voice supported Cortana, inking, and Continuum require more advanced hardware. See www.hp.com/go/windows10upgrade. Apps sold separately.
footnotes.msgfootnote_02: [2] Multi-Core is designed to improve performance of certain software products. Not all customers or software applications will necessarily benefit from use of this technology. 64-bit computing system required. Performance and clock frequency will vary depending on application workload and your hardware and software configurations. Intel’s numbering is not a measurement of higher performance.
footnotes.msgfootnote_03: [3] Sold separately or as an optional feature.

product_description.label: Product Description
product_description.proddes_overview_medium: The HP ProOne 400 20” All-in-One is a feature-rich PC that is a sound investment for your growing business.
product_description.proddes_overview_short: New AiO engineered for growing businesses
product_description.proddes_overview_extended: Easy to deploy, sleek, and feature-rich, the HP ProOne 400 20” All-in-One PC with business-class collaboration, manageability, and security features is a sound investment.

features_group_1.label: Features Group 1
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_01_medium: Easy access to critical parts, rigorous testing, and HP temperature control technology helps ensure your AiO withstands tough work environments.
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_06_medium: Make conferencing from your PC as simple as the touch of a button with the optional HP Conferencing Keyboard.[3]
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_05_medium: DTS Sound+™ lets you make the most of virtual conferencing.
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_04_medium: Help suppress ambient noise including keyboard clicks with HP Noise Reduction Software.
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_03_medium: Pair this space-saving AiO with the stand option[3] to fit your workspace and use case.
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_02_medium: Reduce the complexity of administration. HP Touchpoint Manager,[7] Windows 10[1] manageability features, and HP Common Core BIOS help you easily manage assets.

features_group_2.label: Features Group 2
features_group_2.feature_02_suppt_02_medium: HP BIOSphere[5] and HP Client Security[6] help keep critical data and systems protected with customizable security.

legal_information.label: Legal Information
legal_information.lgldisclaimer_01: [7] HP Touchpoint Manager requires purchase of a subscription and supports Android™, iOS and Windows 7 or higher operating systems and PCs, notebooks, tablets and smartphones from various manufacturers. Not available in all countries see www.hp.com/touchpoint for availability information..
